article_text: The next generation of leaders has shown all the promise the Miami Herald had hoped they would when it identified talented South Florida professionals under the age of 40 who had potential to excel in their industries.

article_metadata.title: Miami Herald’s ‘20 under 40’: Many past winners in the new generation of leaders | Miami Herald
